files.title: Overview
files.summary: The data movement shape indicates the dimension of the data to be moved to or from the [Tensor Memory](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tensor-memory). These shapes are described as a tuple `lane x size` where:
